name: Ricochet (itch) (Ellyth)
description:
This is my first ever game.

The objective is to collect all of the coins hidden behind obstacles by shooting them with a ball.  The ball can bounce of walls and other objects so the trick is to shoot the ball at the correct angle in order to reach each coin.

The game has only 6 levels at the moment because I wanted to get something out early for feedback.

To control the game:

  • Rotate 360deg left or right using by touching or clicking on the arrow buttons on the left
  • Shoot by touching or clicking on the button on the right.
